about_the_game:
A Great Adventure with Cirno!


One sunny morning in Gensokyo, Cirno awakens to find an a notice posted outside her house...

Follow the adventure of Cirno and her friend Daiyousei in this turn-based battle RPG, as she ventures far and wide across the Misty Lake, spurred on by her goal: to discover the secrets of a new form of "Ice", entirely unknown to her. Could it be even better than the ice she can conjure...?!

Meeting the Inhabitants of Gensokyo


In this journey, you will meet many familiar faces of the local populace, including youkai, fairies, and others. The game contains a great amount of interactions and cutscenes with in-engine usage of animations, emotes, movements, and other effects to set it apart from the standard dialogue fare; involving the many inhabitants of Gensokyo that Cirno will meet on her quest!

Fierce Foes to be Fought


Across the mist lake, many aquatic dangers lie hidden just beneath the water's surface. Cirno will need to face them to reach the end of her journey and emerge victorious!
  • Use a growing repertoire of up to 5 different spells to defeat enemies.
  • When it is charged, activate Ice Mode to supercharge any one of your powers, temporarily turning it into a different kind of attack!
  • Time yourself to the enemy's windups be able to nimbly dodge almost any attack in the game. Every enemy has a set of unique attacks and animations to learn!
  • Record your findings with Cirno's journal, an ingame bestiary of every frog Cirno has vanquished.
  • Using the residual magic of her spells, Cirno can charge up to 6 icicles to fire alongside her physical attacks!
With all of these tools combined, you can emerge victorious, and defeat any amphibious foe that lies in your path!!

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Please Note
This videogame is an unofficial fanwork of the Touhou Project. All content featured is within compliance of their guidelines for derivative works.
Please support the original developer's titles, many of which are available on Steam.

name: Touhou: Fearless Frogslayer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Follow Cirno in this RPG adventure as she travels across Misty Lake and beyond, fighting fierce amphibious opponents, all to fulfill her contractual obligations to a certain disguised figure...
